title: Website Launch
description: The early-stage WRIS website has been launched. Several features are planned but not yet implemented. Current efforts focus on building awareness while developing clearer guidance for prospective members.

title: Official Guide Released
description: The official WRIS guide has been released.

title: Official WRIS Group Launched on landing.athabascau.ca
description: The official WRIS group is now live on landing.athabascau.ca

title: Assignment Board Development Underway
description: The Assignment board will be where members can browse and pick-up new assignments.
